name: Space Hook (rivershen)
description:
Right click: Teleport to planet

Left click: Shoot hook

Left/Right Arrow keys: Move counter-clockwise and clockwise, respectively (Note: At the start of the game you have to teleport to a planet first before you can start moving)

R: Restart

Hit the snake-dragon-things with a hook, pull them through the black hole to un-alive them. They must all be destroyed.

The awesome-looking planets came from this person, they rock: https://helianthus-games.itch.io/pixel-art-planets

Feedback greatly appreciated!
